advertisement

Elliot Searer still keeps in touch with some of his teammates from his summer league team including a current player on the Pittsburgh baseball teams roster PERIOD

When the two players have talked about their current seasons the Panther told Searer that his teams offense has been struggling PERIOD

He probably should have clarified though PERIOD Pittsburghs offense is struggling  by Pittsburgh standards PERIOD

Last season the Panthers finished atop the Big East statistical standings with a . team batting average more than  points above the league average PERIOD

Entering Tuesday Pittsburgh  is hitting . still good for first place in the competitive Big East conference PERIOD

However when the instate rivals face off at  p.m PERIOD today at Charles L PERIOD Cost Field in Pittsburgh Penn State  will have something to counter the Panthers offensive prowess PERIOD

The Nittany Lions pitching staff has been dominant of late PERIOD

Our pitching has been great especially our starters senior Mario Eramo said PERIOD When our pitchers come out and get zeros on the board that just gets the whole team fired up and has been a key to our success. the Lions enter Wednesdays contest after taking two of three against No PERIOD  Wichita State on the road last weekend PERIOD Pitching played a huge role in that series coach Robbie Wine said PERIOD

In Fridays game a  loss Penn State starter Heath Johnson couldnt find a rhythm PERIOD The Lions were down  in the first inning then  by the third inning and Wine said took the wind out of the team PERIOD

On Saturday sophomore starter Steven Hill improved to  on the season allowing only one run and three hits in . innings PERIOD Hill has struck out  batters in  innings this season walking only four in his five starts PERIOD

Then in the series finale on Sunday sophomore starter John Walter combined with relievers Greg Welsh Dave Walkling and Ryan Ignas to strike out  Shocker batters PERIOD The four pitchers limited Wichita State  to only three hits in the 11inning game PERIOD

Our pitching obviously is going to be the thing that keeps us in the ball game Searer said PERIOD If our pitchers can allow us to hang around eventually were going to break through. penn State leads the alltime series against Pittsburgh  PERIOD The squads split two games last season with each team winning at home PERIOD

This season the Lions look to take one at the Panthers home field continuing their strong performances on the road PERIOD

Coming in off a good spring break we had some momentum and we wanted to keep that going senior Bobby Jacobs said PERIOD We rode that momentum against Wichita State so hopefully we can keep it going after this too. if youre interested in submitting a Letter to the Editor click here PERIOD

Were always interested in hearing about news in our community PERIOD Let us know whats going on
